amendatorysection.catchline: Agency; status report to Legislative Performance Audit Committee; contents; format.
amendatorysection.para: On or before July 1 of each year, each agency shall provide to the Legislative Performance Audit Committee a status report on all rules and regulations pending before the agency which have not been adopted and promulgated. If an additional appropriation was made with respect to legislation enacted to provide funding for or additional staff to implement a program for which rules and regulations are required to be adopted, the status report shall include what the funding has been used for and what functions the staff have been performing while such rules and regulations are pending. The format of the report shall be established by the committee no later than June 1, 2011, and shall be updated thereafter.
